name: Capital Ring link to Hanwell station

ai.summary: A very short, easy urban stroll along a segment of the Capital Ring near Hanwell Station in the UK. Approximately 0.6 km, suitable for all ages, with flat terrain and a mix of residential streets and parkland.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly paved paths and sidewalks along residential streets, with a short stretch through a green space. Mostly flat with curb edges; occasional gentle gradients at crossings.
ai.safety_notes: Stay to designated paths, be mindful of pedestrians and cyclists in shared spaces, and watch for traffic at road crossings. Daylight can be limited in winter; wear visibility gear if walking at dawn/dusk. Secure valuables and have a small map or phone for navigation.
recommended_gear: Smartphone with offline map or route
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (year-round with proper clothing and daylight considerations)
